title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - motto

content.question: The discussion of the motto (“Over . . . but now”) in the seventh paragraph serves in part to characterize Mr. Unger as someone who

choices.label: takes pride in the town’s long history
feels limited by the town’s lack of opportunities
constantly disagrees with the town’s officials
wants the town to seem more modern

content.answer: wants the town to seem more modern

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
